sentences.en: Acoustics: Science of production, control, transmission, reception, and effects of sound.
sentences.cn: 声学: 探讨声音之产生 、 控制 、 传达 、 接收及其效果的科学.

sentences.en: Bachelor degree or above, majoring in electronical engineering, acoustics or physics.
sentences.cn: 电子工程 、 声学或者相干物理学专业本科及以上课历.

sentences.en: Depth of investigation in sonic logging is studied based on wave acoustics.
sentences.cn: 从波动声学的角度讨论声波测井的探测深度问题.

sentences.en: In acoustics he studied the propagation of sound and musical consonance and dissonance.
sentences.cn: 在声学中,他研究了声的传播和音乐的和谐与不和谐.

sentences.en: It forms a substantial contribution to the subjects of acoustics.
sentences.cn: 它对声学诸问题作出了实质性的贡献.

sentences.en: Its principal Branches are architectural, environmental , musical, and engineering acoustics, and ultrasonics.
sentences.cn: 声学主要分成建筑声学 、 环境声学 、 音乐声学 、 工程声学和超音波.

sentences.en: Some Basic Acoustics of Resonators and Sources, Source - filter Concepts.
sentences.cn: 一些基本的声学理论关于:共鸣体、声源和声源滤波的概念.

sentences.en: The acoustics of the new concert hall are excellent.
sentences.cn: 新音乐厅的传声效果极佳。

sentences.en: The acoustics of the new concert hall are excellent.
sentences.cn: 这座新音乐厅的音响效果极好.

sentences.en: The acoustics of this theater are admirable.
sentences.cn: 这个剧院的音响效果很好.

sentences.en: The acoustics of this theater are faulty.
sentences.cn: 这个剧院的音响效果不好.

sentences.en: The auditorium acoustic design is to gain the excellent room acoustics effect.
sentences.cn: 厅堂音质设计是为了获得优良的音质效果,以更好地发挥厅堂的使用功能.

sentences.en: The auditorium has comfortable seating and modern acoustics.
sentences.cn: 礼堂里有舒适的座椅和现代化的音响设备.

sentences.en: The passive acoustics detection system is available for detecting the anti - radiation UAV.
sentences.cn: 为探测 反 辐射无人机,采用被动声探测系统是一种有效的方法.

sentences.en: Ultrasonic medicine is a interdisciplinary field combined acoustics, medicine and electronics.
sentences.cn: 超声医学是声学 、 医学和电子技术相结合的理、工、医综合学科.

words.tran_cn: [声] 声学的；听觉的；音响的
原声乐器；不用电传音的乐器

trans.tran_cn: 声学，（传声系统的）音响效果，声音的( acoustic的名词复数 )，听觉的，原声的，自然声的
trans.tran_en: the shape and size of a room, which affect the way sound is heard in it
